servinfo.title: Engine Oil and Filter Change

item.ptxt: New and used engine oil can be hazardous.
Be sure to read General Precautions and observe what in written there.
Steps 1) – 11) must be performed with ENGINE NOT RUNNING. For Step 12), be sure to have adequate ventilation while engine is running.

servinfo.ptxt: Before draining engine oil, check engine for oil leakage. If any sign of leakage is found, make sure to correct defective part before proceeding to the following procedure.

s1.ptxt: Drain engine oil by removing drain plug (1).
Wipe drain plug and its mounting surface clean. Reinstall drain plug with new gasket and tighten it to specified torque.
Remove oil filter (1) through space between suspension frame and front side member and loosen it using special tool.
Wipe oil filter mounting surface of cylinder block cleanly.
Apply engine oil to new oil filter O-ring.
Screw new filter on oil filter stand by hand until filter O-ring touches filter mounting surface.

attention2.ptxt: To tighten oil filter properly, it is important to accurately identify the position at which filter O-ring first contacts the mounting surface.

s1.ptxt: Tighten oil filter (1) 3/4 turn from the point of contact with filter mounting surface using an oil filter wrench.
Replenish oil up to FULL level mark on dipstick (oil pan and oil filter capacity). The filler inlet is at top of cylinder head cover.
Use only engine oil of SG, SH, SJ, SL or SM grade.
Select the appropriate oil viscosity according to the chart [A].
SAE 0W-20 oil is the best choice for good fuel economy, and good starting in cold weather.

item.ptxt: Engine oil capacity is specified below. However, note that the amount of oil required when actually changing oil may somewhat differ from the data depending on various conditions (temperature, viscosity, etc.)
The specified engine oil and “proper engine oil viscosity chart [A]” included in this manual are given as typical ones.
The actual engine oil and proper engine oil viscosity, however, vary depending on the vehicle specifications and such typical chart may not be applicable to some models.
Therefore, for the specific information on the engine oil and proper engine oil viscosity, refer to “Engine Oil and Filter” section of the Owner’s Manual.

sdm1.sdm-value: About 4.6 liters (9.72 US pt. / 8.09 lmp pt.)
About 0.2 liters (0.42 US pt. / 0.35 lmp pt.)
About 0.4 liters (0.85 US pt. / 0.70 lmp pt.)
About 5.2 liters (10.99 US pt. / 9.15 lmp pt.)

s1.ptxt: Check oil filter and drain plug for oil leakage.
Start engine and run it for 3 min. Stop it and wait 5 min before checking oil level. If necessary, add oil up to FULL level mark (hole) (1) on dipstick.
